title: What should we write, “will not” or “won't”? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, It’s almost exactly the same and it can be used for everything… But, it depends on the subject what we are talking about, the tense , and singular or plural… Ex- I won’t be coming to the birthday party today Ex- I will not be coming to the birthday party today As you can see, both of them does not make much of a difference,. Just choose one which suits the best according to the conversation you are having and impress your friends with your English!!!
